Posts.Content: LifeAndQualityOfLife wrote: Has anyone had experience with this radiation treatment? It is for those diagnosed with stage 1 with tumors less than 3 cm. LifeAndQualityOfLife Dx 4/1/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 1, 2/6 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
